pkgmetadata.longdescription: This software package provides users with industry standard benchmarks for measuring the performance of the Intel(R) Xeon Phi(TM) X200 Processor. In addition to providing compiled executable versions of the benchmarks, there is also a Python automation infrastructure that will run the benchmarks and provide analysis of the results. Some benchmark source code is provided.

use.flag: Builds additional benchmarks that require a Parallel Studio Cluster License
